page.title: 08Farming, NW Fringe of Derby
page.content: Only two farms lie in this sector: {Markeaton Stones Farm (GR330384),}run by the Sutton family and{Mackworth {House Farm (GR314378),}owned by the Clarke-Maxwell family and run by a manager. The first farm is 204 acres with 75 beef cattle and crops of barley, silage & hay. The second farm is 650 acres with 75- 80 dairy cattle, a flock of 40 ewes plus crops of rape, oats, beans, wheat, barley (spring & winter) and grass. Both farms are on mainly alluvial soils with patches of boulder clay. Markeaton Stones farm does not employ additional labour but there is a small agricultural engineering firm using workshops rent-free. Mackworth House Farm employs 5 full time staff.
